title: Gujarati-only ladies tailor business website (Gayatri Ladies Tailor) with AI-illustration placeholders

requirements.text: Implement a clean, mobile-friendly multi-page website for the ladies tailoring business using four pages: Home, About Us, Services, and Contact Us.

quotes:
Pages Required:
1. Home
2. About Us
3. Services
4. Contact Us
Want me to build the full code?
Yes

acceptanceCriteria: Site provides navigation to exactly these four pages: Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile screens.
Navigation highlights the current page and works without page reload issues (SPA routing).

requirements.text: Use Gujarati-only content for all visible website text (headings, paragraphs, buttons, labels) and apply a Gujarati font across the entire site.

quotes: Language: Gujarati only

Design Rules (Strict):
- Use Gujarati font only

acceptanceCriteria: All visible text in the UI is Gujarati (no English labels/buttons).
A Gujarati font is applied globally (e.g., via CSS/Tailwind) so Gujarati glyphs render consistently.

requirements.text: Apply the strict design rules: background must be white or light cream; all normal text color must be black; the shop name “Gayatri Ladies Tailor” must be displayed in a large, elegant dark red style.

quotes:
Design Rules (Strict):
- All normal text color: Black
- Shop name “Gayatri Ladies Tailor”:
  - Large font size
  - Dark Red color
  - Elegant and aesthetic look
- Background: White / light cream

acceptanceCriteria: Default body/background is white or light cream across pages.
Body text is black by default (no gray body text).
The shop name is prominently styled in dark red with noticeably larger typography than other headings.

requirements.text: Build the Home page with: a hero section containing the shop name (dark red), a sewing/tailoring-themed illustration (not a real photo), a short Gujarati description, clearly shown working time (7:00 AM to 9:00 PM), and a prominent Call Now button that initiates a phone call to 7359316413.

quotes:
Home Page:
- Hero section with shop name in dark red
- Sewing / tailoring themed illustration image (not real photo)
- Short Gujarati description
- Working time shown clearly
- Call Now button with mobile number
Working Time: 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM
Mobile Number: 7359316413

acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows the working time in Gujarati and clearly formatted.
Call Now button uses a tel: link pointing to 7359316413 and is easy to tap on mobile.
Hero uses an illustration image (not a human model photo) and the image section is labeled as replaceable.

requirements.text: Build the About Us page using the provided business details (Owner: Patel Geetaben J.; Work From Home; ladies tailoring) with Gujarati-only copy and a minimal tailoring tools illustration/icon placeholder labeled as replaceable.

quotes: Owner Name: Patel Geetaben J.
Business Type: Ladies Tailoring (Work From Home)

About Us Page:
... Replaceable illustration:
Simple icon of fabric, scissors or tailoring tools.

acceptanceCriteria: About page content is Gujarati-only and reflects owner name and work-from-home tailoring service.
Page includes a non-photo illustration/icon and the section is marked as replaceable.

requirements.text: Build the Services page showing each listed service as its own card/row with a simple icon/illustration (no real photos): Normal Blouse, Fancy Blouse, Navratri Special Chaniya Choli, Dress Designing, Western Dress, Custom Ladies Stitching.

quotes:
Services Page:
- Each service shown with simple icon or illustration (no real photos)

Specialist In:
- Normal Blouse
- Fancy Blouse
- Navratri Special Chaniya Choli
- Dress Designing
- Western Dress
- Custom Ladies Stitching

acceptanceCriteria: Services list includes exactly the six services provided, in Gujarati.
Each service has a simple icon/illustration; no real photos are used.
Services layout is mobile-friendly (e.g., 1-column on mobile, optional grid on larger screens).

requirements.text: Build the Contact Us page displaying mobile number (7359316413), working hours (7:00 AM to 9:00 PM), and a simple Gujarati call-to-action; include a minimal phone/message illustration placeholder labeled as replaceable.

quotes:
Contact Page:
- Mobile number
- Working hours
- Simple Gujarati call-to-action text
Mobile Number: 7359316413
Working Time: 7:00 AM to 9:00 PM

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays phone number and working hours clearly in Gujarati.
Phone number is clickable (tel: link).
Contact illustration is non-photographic and marked as replaceable.

requirements.text: Add a coherent, minimal, local-business-friendly visual theme that stays within the strict rules (light cream/white background, black text, dark red accent) and apply it consistently across all pages (spacing, card style, icon style, typography scale).

quotes: Keep the website minimal, trustworthy, and easy to read.
Simple, local-business friendly layout
Background: White / light cream
All normal text color: Black
Shop name ... Dark Red color

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent layout structure (header/nav, content width, section spacing).
Only dark red is used as a primary accent color; backgrounds remain white/light cream; body text remains black.
Overall look is minimal and trustworthy (no busy patterns, no heavy gradients).

requirements.text: Use AI-generated illustrations/icons or fabric/sewing themed placeholder images only; do not use real human model photos; clearly label each image block/section as replaceable for future updates.

quotes: Do NOT assume real photos are available
Use elegant AI-generated illustrations, icons, or fabric/sewing themed placeholder images
Avoid using real human model photos
Clearly mark image sections as replaceable later

acceptanceCriteria: No real-photo human imagery appears anywhere in the site.
Every illustration/image area includes a small Gujarati label indicating it is replaceable.
All imagery style is minimal and professional (consistent icon/illustration style).

requirements.text: Add the generated illustration/image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the relevant sections (hero, about, services icons, contact).

quotes: Use elegant AI-generated illustrations, icons, or fabric/sewing themed placeholder images

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Pages reference these images via static paths (no backend image serving).
Images load correctly in the browser and have appropriate alt text (Gujarati).

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and the immutable hook/entry paths listed by the platform must not be modified directly; compose them from outside if needed.
Single-canister architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
Use English only for this build request document; website UI text itself must be Gujarati-only.
nonGoals: Do not add authentication (including Internet Identity) or user accounts.
Do not add a CMS/admin panel for editing content.
Do not integrate maps/geolocation or third-party messaging/email services.
Do not use real human model photos or assume access to real shop photography.

required: Minimal elegant sewing machine line illustration on light background (hero-sewing-illustration.dim_1400x800.png)
Minimal tailoring tools icon set style illustration (about-tailoring-tools.dim_800x600.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer Gujarati-only UI text and Gujarati typography for small business sites.
Prefer minimal, mobile-friendly layouts with light backgrounds, black body text, and dark red accents.
Prefer AI-generated minimal illustrations/icons instead of real photos; avoid human model photos.
